author: BBC News
title: British Airways: Flights cancelled amid IT crash
description: All British Airways flights leaving Heathrow and Gatwick are cancelled until 18:00 BST.

author: BBC News
title: British Airways: Computer problems hit passengers
description: The airline says it has no evidence at this stage to suggest a cyber attack.

author: BBC News
title: Manchester attack: Terror threat reduced from critical to severe
description: The national terrorism threat level comes down to severe, meaning an attack is likely, not imminent.

author: BBC News
title: IRA bombing campaign 'wrong' - Jeremy Corbyn
description: Jeremy Corbyn seeks to distance himself from the IRA's actions in the Troubles, as the Tories step up criticism.
